MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in Mobberley and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 5:45PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of work required and our team is now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:32PM on Sunday 3rd January 2021.
